name: Build and Publish

on:
    # run it on push to the default repository branch
    push:
        branches: [master]

jobs:
    # define job to build and publish docker image
    build-and-push-docker-image:
        name: Build Docker image and push to repositories
        # run only when code is compiling and tests are passing
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest

        # steps to perform in job
        steps:
            - name: Checkout code
              uses: actions/checkout@v2

            # setup Docker buld action
            - name: Set up Docker Buildx
              id: buildx
              uses: docker/setup-buildx-action@v1

            - name: Login to DockerHub
              uses: docker/login-action@v1
              with:
                username: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_USERNAME }}
                password: ${{ secrets.DOCKERHUB_TOKEN }}

            - name: Login to Github Packages
              uses: docker/login-action@v1
              with:
                registry: ghcr.io
                username: ${{ github.actor }}
                password: ${{ secrets.GHCR_PAT }}

            - name: Build fr3nch13702/cakephp:php7.4-cli
              uses: docker/build-push-action@v2
              with:
                # relative path to the place where source code with Dockerfile is located
                context: ./images/php-7.4-cli
                # Note: tags has to be all lower-case
                tags: |
                    fr3nch13702/cakephp:php7.4-cli
                    ghcr.io/302dev/docker/cakephp:php7.4-cli
                # build on feature branches, push only on main branch
                push: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/master' }}

            - name: Build fr3nch13702/cakephp:php7.4-apache
              uses: docker/build-push-action@v2
              with:
                # relative path to the place where source code with Dockerfile is located
                context: ./images/php-7.4-apache
                # Note: tags has to be all lower-case
                tags: |
                    fr3nch13702/cakephp:php7.4-apache
                    ghcr.io/302dev/docker/cakephp:php7.4-apache
                # build on feature branches, push only on main branch
                push: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/master' }}

            - name: Build fr3nch13702/cakephp:php8.0-cli
              uses: docker/build-push-action@v2

                # relative path to the place where source code with Dockerfile is located

                    fr3nch13702/cakephp:php8.0-cli
                    ghcr.io/302dev/docker/cakephp:php8.0-cli
                # build on feature branches, push only on main branch
                push: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/master' }}

            - name: Build fr3nch13702/cakephp:php8.0-apache

                push: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/master' }}

              uses: docker/build-push-action@v2
              with:
                # relative path to the place where source code with Dockerfile is located
                context: ./images/php-8.1

                tags: |
                    fr3nch13702/cakephp:php8.1-cli
                    ghcr.io/302dev/docker/cakephp:php8.1-cli
                # build on feature branches, push only on main branch
                push: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/master' }}

            - name: Build fr3nch13702/cakephp:php8.1-apache
              uses: docker/build-push-action@v2
              with:
                # relative path to the place where source code with Dockerfile is located
                context: ./images/php-8.1-apache
                # Note: tags has to be all lower-case
                tags: |

                # build on feature branches, push only on main branch
                push: ${{ github.ref == 'refs/heads/master' }}

                # relative path to the place where source code with Dockerfile is located

                tags: |
